sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content: CoWriter is your AI-powered creative writing assistant. It helps you brainstorm ideas, develop characters, build worlds, and work through writing challenges collaboratively.

sections.title: Basic Usage
sections.content: Simply type your message or question in the input field at the bottom and press **Enter** to send. CoWriter will respond with helpful suggestions, questions, or creative input based on your needs.

subsections.title: Sending Messages
subsections.content: Press **Enter** to send your message, or **Shift+Enter** to add a new line without sending. You can also click the send button or use the expand button for longer text.

subsections.title: Editing Messages
subsections.content: Hover over any message to see action buttons. You can edit your messages or regenerate AI responses. Deleted messages cannot be recovered.

sections.title: Personalization
sections.content: Customize CoWriter's personality and responses through the Settings panel to match your writing style and preferences.

subsections.title: Tones & Styles
subsections.content: Choose from different conversational tones (like encouraging or analytical) and writing styles (like detailed or concise) to personalize how CoWriter responds to you.

subsections.title: World Context
subsections.content: Save information about your fictional world, characters, or project that CoWriter should remember throughout your conversations. This context is included in every chat.

sections.title: Custom Prompts
sections.content: Create your own prompts to tailor CoWriter exactly to your needs. Access the Prompts tab in Settings to manage all your custom content.

subsections.title: Main Prompts
subsections.content: The main system prompt defines CoWriter's core behavior. You can create custom main prompts for different types of writing projects or moods.

subsections.title: Quick Prompts
subsections.content: Create reusable prompt snippets that you can quickly insert into conversations. Access them via the lightning bolt button next to the message input.

subsections.title: Templates
subsections.content: Templates are specialized prompts for specific writing scenarios like character development, plot assistance, or world building. Select them from the dropdown in the header.

sections.title: Chat Management
sections.content: Save important conversations and organize them into folders for easy reference later.

subsections.title: Saving Chats
subsections.content: Click the save button to preserve your conversation. Give it a descriptive name and organize it into a folder. You can overwrite existing chats with the same name.

subsections.title: Loading Chats
subsections.content: Click the folder button to browse and load your saved conversations. Chats are organized by folder and show the number of messages and last modified date.

sections.title: Configuration
sections.content: Set up your AI provider and API key to enable CoWriter's functionality.

subsections.title: API Setup
subsections.content: You'll need an API key from a supported provider (Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, or OpenAI). Enter your key in the Configuration tab and test the connection.

subsections.title: Models
subsections.content: Different AI models have different strengths. Experiment with various models to find what works best for your writing style and needs.

sections.title: Tips & Tricks
sections.content: Get the most out of CoWriter with these helpful tips and techniques.

subsections.title: Effective Prompting
subsections.content: Be specific about what you need help with. Instead of 'help with my character,' try 'help me develop my character's backstory and motivation for betraying their best friend.'

subsections.title: Iterative Development
subsections.content: Use CoWriter for back-and-forth development. Start with a basic idea, then build on CoWriter's responses to refine and expand your concepts.
